description: Whether it’s weekends away or coffee on campus – don’t trip – Daytripper does it all. Merging what people love about natural fibers (soft hand feel, comfort, breathability) into a synthetic fabric that delivers wicking and durability, Daytripper is designed for guys on the go.
name: Saxx Underwear Daytripper Boxer Brief Fly, 5" Inseam - Mens
